name: tvOS 13.4.8
available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Yu Zhou(@yuzhou6666) of 小鸡帮 working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative
Anonymous working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative, JunDong Xie and XingWei Lin of Ant-Financial Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: 08Tc3wBB working with ZecOps

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: an anonymous researcher, Mickey Jin of Trend Micro

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Zhuo Liang of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team working with 360 BugCloud

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: An issue existed within the path validation logic for symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved path sanitization.

cves.credit: Cees Elzinga, Zhongcheng Li (CK01) from Zero-dayits Team of Legendsec at Qi'anxin Group

advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: An authorization issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Min (Spark) Zheng and Xiaolong Bai of Alibaba Inc.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to perform denial of service attack using malformed Bluetooth packets
advisories.description: An input validation issue existed in Bluetooth. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Multiple buffer overflow issues existed in openEXR
advisories.description: Multiple issues in openEXR were addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted XML may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution

cves.credit: Found by OSS-Fuzz

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker may have been able to impersonate a trusted website using shared key material for an administrator added certificate
advisories.description: A certificate validation issue existed when processing administrator added certificates. This issue was addressed with improved certificate validation.

cves.credit: Brian Wolff of Asana

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: An issue existed within the path validation logic for symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved path sanitization.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: 0011 working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may prevent Content Security Policy from being enforced
advisories.description: An access issue existed in Content Security Policy. This issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

cves.credit: Ayoub AIT ELMOKHTAR of Noon

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able to bypass Pointer Authentication
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed with improved logic.

cves.credit: Samuel Groß of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A malicious attacker may be able to conceal the destination of a URL
advisories.description: A URL Unicode encoding issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Rakesh Mane (@RakeshMane10)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Copying a URL from Web Inspector may lead to command injection
advisories.description: A command injection issue existed in Web Inspector. This issue was addressed with improved escaping.

cves.credit: Ophir Lojkine (@lovasoa)

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to cause heap corruption via a crafted SCTP stream
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: natashenka of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected system termination or corrupt kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.
